website_summaries.verdict: This kit includes a starter lens, providing a great value and 4K video recording capability.
pros: Plenty of extra lenses and other accessories you can buy to give this camera more power
A bit smaller than a DSLR-style camera, which is great for travel
Can pull individual photos out of the video stream you're recording
cons: Not quite as fast performing as some other models

website_summaries.verdict: Stunning image quality and an equally impressive price tag that those on a budget will appreciate.
pros: Can customize buttons for easy access to menu options you need
cons: Some users say it feels cheap

customer_reviews.title: The camera worked great for the first little while
customer_reviews.text: The camera worked great for the first little while. However, after a few months the camera has started to display some serious issues: sometimes when recording, the screen will be overlaid with flashing pink static lines (an example has been attached); after pressing the button to stop a recording, the camera takes an additional 5-10 seconds to actually stop recording before freezing, and another 5-10 seconds to unfreeze and become useable again. The camera has never been dropped, and is always transported in a camera bag. I'm not sure if the product I received is defective, because I've read nothing but rave reviews about the G7, but all in all I'm extremely disappointed with the camera I received.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Great littel 4k video camera
customer_reviews.text: Great for a mini 4k video/cinema rig. I use it with old Canon FD lenses and adapters. My only complaint is that you can't attach an external monitor with the HDMI port and still record to the SD card. I designed my own matte box and CNC cut it out of Kydex plastic sheets I bought on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Richard C. Cruz Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Works great for a novice with room to grow!
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded to this camera for my YouTube channel and online class business. I had used a Samsung F90 for years and liked it a lot but wanted a better image quality which this provided. The on board mic is fantastic and you have the option to add an external one. I recommend ordering an extra battery so you can always have one charged in case you need to swap mid project as video will drain it faster than photos. I get a couple of hours on a video charge. I am not doing anything advanced with this camera but so far so good! Check out recent videos on The Frugal crafter youtube channel to see this camera in action.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Weirich

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good!
customer_reviews.text: This is not a good cricket cage. It is however pretty at taking photos and videos. I wish I could do 4K at 120 FPS, but you know you can't have everything. The is one of the highest rated bug containers out there for folks doing YouTube videos. I really just wanted to put crickets in a cage and this is not the right product for that, but once I find a suitable cricket cage I will take some amazing photos of my captive critters. Small lightweight, and finally enough wheels with a good touchscreen. I feel a little silly for only ever owning Nikon or Canon in the past...
customer_reviews.author: caster of shadows

customer_reviews.title: Great camera with slow video AF.
customer_reviews.text: Great camera, love its menu, firmware, light weight, amazing kit lens performance, very nice button combination to read shutter count. However, still concern about low light performance in M43 sensor compared to Aps-c and FF sensors, also, video AF was terrible, it took forever to refocus so if you plan to use AF in videos, it's not going to work for you.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin N.

customer_reviews.title: Great for low budget film makers
customer_reviews.text: I have really come to love this camera. It was a pain in the butt at first to learn all the features of the camera...it is quite complicated. But after several months of using it, I've come to find the features I use and ignore the ones I don't. It shoots great video and the best feature is the microphone port. I just finished making a documentary with this camera.
customer_reviews.author: David Gilmore

customer_reviews.title: You can't go wrong with this camera for shooting video
customer_reviews.text: Use as a webcam with streamlabs obs and an elgato camlink . Also for my wife to record her makeup videos for YouTube . Just unbelieveable quality for the $$ and I did a ton of research before buying . Lens up to this point does everything we need it to do , everything is easy to use and understand. Interface is clean and straight forward , gives explanations of most of the settings while you work inside the menu for newbies which is awesome .
customer_reviews.author: Fizzybubbly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect For A Budget
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for beginner film makers and photographers on a budget ! The price changes once in a while and go as low as 500! It has really nice quality and its easy to use. The wifi options help upload your photos to your phone and upload them yo social media without waiting to connect it to a computer ! It takes really nice pictures and has a nice bulk! Would buy another 2 !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smaller size but bigger fun factor
customer_reviews.text: I got this to compare with my Canon M6 and M50. While the Canon has better autofocus I found that for my needs, clean live video output, this Panasonic was better. So for more static video recording, and the small comfortable form factor, I find I'm having more fun with this.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Love this camera, mirroless FTW!
customer_reviews.text: Upgrading from a canon t3i, mirrorless cameras are the future of the photography business. I am very happy with my G7 and have been using it for the past few weeks. Video quality in 4K is incredible and the camera is perfect for my day trips and hiking trips as it is very light weight compared to mirrors DSLRs. It does take a bit to get use to all the features, but there are many tutorials online. Overall love this camera and suits my needs for now!
customer_reviews.author: Eric Ventures

customer_reviews.title: Great m4/3 camera.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this camera. The G7 is my first real camera other than the little point and shoot and iPhone. A little on the small side for my hands but also easy to stow. Problem was, it opened the door to my new, current and more expensive Lumix G9. Then came the quiver of lenses, and the backpack, then the other thingamabobs you need.... Thanks, Panasonic Lumix for getting me hooked on your great cameras and lenses.
customer_reviews.author: CygnusX

customer_reviews.title: Ok for stills, terrible for video.
customer_reviews.text: Great entry level mirrorless 4k camera but if you choose to shoot video, know that the HDMI output goes black when recording, which means no external video monitor while recording. 30 minute limit while in record mode. I purchased an Atomos Monitor/recorder and let this unit do the recording and keep the camera in standby mode. My solution to the HDMI output shut off when recording. Atomos Ninja V with Sony 500 GB memory card. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Luthi

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This camera does exactly what I bought it for, mainly a backup camera to my Canon 5DMKII. As a bonus it also gives me a 4K capability I didn't have before. Combined with a lens adapter it also takes my Canon lenses for just the price of the adapter. I am impressed with the video quality (which is mainly what I use a DSLR, or in this case mirrorless camera, for), and it is stacked with features such as wifi and built in time-lapse that my Canon does not have. I would recommend this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Robert James Randle III

customer_reviews.title: Perfect low light videos
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I wanted. I mainly use it to record myself playing guitar under interior low light. Together with PANASONIC LUMIX G LENS, 25MM, F1.7 ASPH, They are the perfect budget combination for me.
customer_reviews.author: TikoyBilog46

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera for beginner.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this after watching many reviews. It showed up at my door and once I opened it.. I was impressed.. nice layout, felt good in the hand, but it also felt kind of cheap... if that makes sense. It takes nice pictures and has a lot of really cool options as far as the types of pictures you want to take, without spending hours in photoshop. The low light shooting modes are amazing.. I’m no professional photographer.. I just like to take pictures.. I do like the camera more than the Canon T6i I sold back in March of 2019... I just ordered the g85... I think I’ll be much happier with that.
customer_reviews.author: Knuckles

customer_reviews.title: Good over all camera for photos and video.
customer_reviews.text: I did alot of research before buying this camera. Overall great camera, takes great pictures and video for the price. After almost 6 months of owning the camera I have had no issues under moderate. Pros - light weight, after studying it for a while pretty easy to use, good battery life for how I have used it, great pictures and video. Great price for a 4k camera. Cons - Video Image Stability not the greatest and kit lines feels cheap but both not a deal breaker.
customer_reviews.author: Trialsin26

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera with good photos and video
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera to use for better video quality and to do more photography. I am extremely pleased with this camera. It works great and gives great video quality. I know a lot of people complain about the autofocus on it, but I have yet to experience autofocus that is extremely slow yet. But keep in mind, it may still be an issue. I use this mainly on a tripod so the lack on image stabilization on the camera body isn't a big issue for me.
customer_reviews.author: mtux96

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Budget Camera!
customer_reviews.text: I’m in love with this camera! At a sub $500 price point this is an amazing camera! I’m obsessed with the black and white pictures this camera produces as you see here! If you are a small operation or someone who just wants a solid jack it all trades camera I highly recommend this one! Video quality is great as well! I film at 1080p at 60fps because the auto focus is best in that setting but the 4K is very good for a camera this cheap!
customer_reviews.author: Zak Barry

customer_reviews.title: Great Starter Camera for YouTube/Twitch
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this camera to give my YouTube Channel and Twitch stream a boost, and I am very glad I did. I used to use a webcam but the quality and auto focus ability of it were as bad as cold french fries. This has a very great picture quality for both video recording, and for doing regular photo shooting.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Kaylor

customer_reviews.title: A Fantastic 4K Digital Camera; the LUMIX G7
customer_reviews.text: Where do I start, this Lumix G7 is a Monster-Of-A-Camera! From it's brilliant photos, to it's sharp videos, it's an all around great investment. One slight down fall, IF YOU USE AUTO FOCUS, is that while shooting in 4K, the auto focus is slow in searching and focusing on it's subject. But, if you're like me, and shoot in Manual Focus Settings, then you're in for an excellent investment. This 4K Lumix G7 by Panasonic is a Powerhouse!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Fingerz

customer_reviews.title: Best VALUE for PRICE!
customer_reviews.text: I use this camera to shoot my YouTube videos, it's a definate upgrade from my last mirrorless fixed lens, and at this price, to have 4k, flip out screen, this amount of features, is superb. Extremely satisfied with the purchase, so much so that I am considering getting a second one. I defaulted Auto Focus and image stabilization to 3 stars, as I shoot from fixed locations, either a tripod or a top-down rig I don't really get to test the OIS. I also shoot strictly in manual mode, so I don't use AF, but from what I've played with it seems sufficient enough. In all, very satisfied with the camera its been great, kit lens is actually good.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Williams Jr

customer_reviews.title: I love this camera.
customer_reviews.text: This is my new favorite camera for video! I love the 4k and the 1080p isn't bad either. The kit lens is adequate for now. I'll be buying a 25mm soon. This thing takes amazing pictures as well. Also, I got mine for $429 refurbished and it came seemingly brand new with all accessories in the box. One of my best tech purchases ever.
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: Auto-focus is terrible and ruinined my videos
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to record on YouTube and struggled to get it to stay in focus. In auto-focus, the focus will wander during the recording and in manual focus, you have to get creative to find ways to focus on yourself if you are doing solo recordings. After a couple of botched shoots, I sent it back and went with the Sony A6600. You can find less expensive options but I found the Sony to be incredibly easy to set up and use for video. I pretty much just put it on a tripod and hit record. The color also seems to be better on the A6600 for video.
customer_reviews.author: jwebb

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend for beginners of video and photography.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic beginners camera, not a pro so I cant speak on that. Pictures and videos look outstanding. Can look up some YouTube tutorials to get the lay of the land on how to handle this beast of a camera. Small and compact, easy to reach button configuration, feels solid and fits nicely in my shreak like hands as well as nicely in my wife's tiny hands.
customer_reviews.author: Kanvis

customer_reviews.title: Great Starter Camera
customer_reviews.text: After much research on purchasing my first DSLR/Mirrorless camera, I decided on the Lumix G7. For the price I have no complaints other than the AF hunting issues that seems to be an across the board problem with Panasonic cameras and live view monitoring while recording would have been nice, as well. I shoot in MF so its not a major problem for me personally. The photo and video image quality are fantastic and with it's small size and weight it is a great camera for long period handheld use. Overall I'm pleased with the features and quality of the camera.
customer_reviews.author: Burton Nuse

customer_reviews.title: Best buy this year
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this camera. It is the very first DSLR that I have purchased. I have had it for a week and used it for my live streams, recorded videos, and photos. It has been easy to learn and navigate for the best possible images and videos I can record. The autofocus does take a bit of getting used to and can be a bit tricky if the subject is not stationary. But overall I am extremely satisfied with the results I am getting from my G&
customer_reviews.author: Earl Hall Studio

customer_reviews.title: Just an amazing Camera to have.
customer_reviews.text: I usually don’t write a comment but I feel like I need to provide one for that camera. The camera exceeds my expectations. The picture quality, the feelings, the built, and the design are just amazing. I can shoot low light no issue at all. No need to buy expensive Canon or Sony, that little boy does the work perfectly. I would recommend Panasonic LUMIX to anyone looking to start a photography business or just for personal use.
customer_reviews.author: jhon

customer_reviews.title: It's like buying a Mercedes for the price of a Toyota.
customer_reviews.text: Good entry level camera for those who will eventually purchase a more expensive DSLR or Mirrorless cameras. It is so worth the price you pay because it has so many features you normally find in professional cameras. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Merlo

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Ive been using this camera for both pictures and film recording. I HATE the 4k photo, its confusing and the quailty is not as good. as you think it would be. BUT the regular photo mode is awesome. now the 4k video is a diffrent story. Very crisp clear video. the auto focus on the video some times can't keep up but i dont consider it a major default.
customer_reviews.author: gerald casperson

customer_reviews.title: Non existent customer support.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. I own many that work fine. Beware Panasonic customer service has gone as low as it can. They are no help at all. Phone support takes longer than most phone batteries will last. Last call 45 min on hold no help. Chat line sends back canned responses or will have an email message later. That is always please visit us at and start all over again. So hardware is great but if you need help registering or getting to the 3 year warranty page forget it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for an amateur photographer.
customer_reviews.text: It's easy to use and has lots of cool effects. I don't know enough about photography to know if a more experience user would have issues with it. I did a lot of research before I bought this.
customer_reviews.author: Steven M Benson

customer_reviews.title: Music Videos
customer_reviews.text: I been shooting music videos for a few years now on the canon 6d love canon but I wanted a lil more out of my camera for videos and that being.. auto focus/4K and 1080p at 60fps for slow mo and this lil guy does just that!!! It’s small and light weight can’t lie it does feel a lil cheap maybe cuz I’m used to the Canon 6D with a battery pack but when you start shooting and see what this lil guy produces all that goes away I wish they made a battery pack but buying a extra battery no prob..check out my channel to see sample videos soon.. YouTube/corymphotos IG:@corymphotos
customer_reviews.author: @CORYMPHOTOS

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I am using the camera as my main camera for live streaming, Zoom and Mircrosoft Teams video meetings. The image quality is excellent at an affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: Amy A.

customer_reviews.title: Best in it's class
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a camera that shoots in 4k, this is absolutely the best choice out there both in price and overall quality. Both picture and video look amazing and depending on the profile you can get great colors straight from the camera without having to do any color correction or grading. The ONLY drawback is the auto focus(AFC) for video. If you are shooting in 4k, the auto focus is slow and tends to hunt quite a bit depending on what you are filming. However, I found that if you shoot in 1080p FHD, the auto focus works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Love my Panasonic Lumix!! Fabulous video and pictures!!
customer_reviews.text: I searched and searched for a reasonably priced camera to shoot video for my online training courses. I saw this one on a you tube video about cameras and I purchased it. I love it! It takes fantastic videos and pictures and it is easy breezy to upload to my computer!! I highly recommend this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Laura J. Kendall

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: Not bad for the price. I had a hard time getting used to the lack of build quality and lack of IBIS and returned it. Also the wheel for the shutter speed was a bit misplaced and it was too easy to accidentally move while simply holding the camera. Eventually I returned this for the G85 which resolved all my complaints. Again I don't hate this camera, it just wasn't right for me. But it is far from being a bad camera.
customer_reviews.author: E. Caspersen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: Excellent bang for your buck. If you're looking for a great 4K camera that won't break the bank that's simple to use and incredibly versatile I don't think you can do any better than this for the money. Doesn't overheat, fairly sturdy, and can be used with any Micro 4/3 lenses which are easy to come by. Still getting the hang of it but the footage is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: This camera checks off all my boxes!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This camera is great!!!! I got it for youtube because it checked off all my boxes. 1. 4K recording 2. Mic jack 3. Flip out screen 4. Light weight I have sense even started using it for photography and really like it!!!! Only thing to consider is no IBS.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Hall Simple Tech Review

customer_reviews.title: A great DSLR camera. Buy it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very much an amateur when it comes to photography or high end videography, but it's not hard to tell just how good this camera is. The pictures are beautiful and the videos are so clear that it's almost hard to believe. I'm interested in stating a YouTube channel at some point which is why I purchased this camera. And after only a week of owning it I can whole heartedly say that this is one of the best purchases I've made in the last few years. It's a great camera especially for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Tom MacDonald

customer_reviews.title: very lighweight camera with 4K still and video
customer_reviews.text: an amazing little camera with 2x crop factor. limited native lens choices BUT with CommLite adapter you can add APS-C lenses to your arsenal of tools to achieve phenomenal results. You can shoot 4K still images as well as video to capture some rare moments. Very lightweight travel camera can be a welcome relief.
customer_reviews.author: David Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value for the price
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera. I’m still learning a lot on how to use it but as far as value, this is the jackpot. Amazing pictures, video, flip screen, 4k. this camera is great for anyone and i could not be happier with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Gipp

customer_reviews.title: Not happy. Camera is worth half of what I paid.
customer_reviews.text: I should have spent an additional $100 and got a gh4. This camera is not worth the money. Auto focus is terrible. Camera is missing accessories. Lense that was included is bad. This camera is worth about $200.
customer_reviews.author: Prime fan 1

customer_reviews.title: Great camera!
customer_reviews.text: I got this camera for my girlfriend. She wanted to get more into photography. This camera is a great entrance into that world for her. Very well made and works great! The lens that comes with it is nothing special at all, but that should be expected. We couldn’t be happier with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Maxson

customer_reviews.title: Not bad.....
customer_reviews.text: This camera is wonderful! It does what I need it to do with great quality. The only thing I don't like is the auto focus. Sometimes it doesn't focus in quick enough and stay there. The focus goes in and out at times unless you use manual focus.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Shoots great video with a fantastic raw color
customer_reviews.text: What a powerhouse of a camera. 4k/30fps packed in to a tiny little body. Camera is very lightweight, which detracts from the stability of the footage shot with it. Shoots great video with a fantastic raw color, great for post processing and color correction. Photos look pretty good too.
customer_reviews.author: Randal R.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent camera! Very versatile.
customer_reviews.text: As with all DSLRs, you're limited to 30 mins of video recoding...which is a bit awkward. However, the ease with which the G7 does everything else makes up for it. I use mine to video my podcasts. So far, it has been outstanding in every setting!
customer_reviews.author: CoachD in Kentucky

customer_reviews.title: CLEAN 4k and 1080 OUT!! Has all the best features of the GH4.
customer_reviews.text: What an amazing camera. If you want the ability to have 422 8bit out the hdmi in BOTH 180 and 4k UHD, this is the camera for you. Full tested on both the Atomos Ninja 2 and the Apollo 4k recorder, Plastic body is the only thing that is a negative, but if you can live with that, its does all the things I needed from the GH4 for a fraction of the price.
customer_reviews.author: Brian R.O Dickson

customer_reviews.title: Best beginning camera for features vs price!
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these now and can’t recommend a better starter camera. Great for vlog and cinematic shots. Understanding how to use a camera is, of course, key. While I wish there was the ability to use an external monitor while recording, the flip out LCD does a great job! I’ve recommended this camera to many, and those who bought it were very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Tony Giannotti

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Great camera. Sent back due to picture quality not exceeding camera I have. But wish I had kept just for evf position and general FEEL of camera. Currently using sony product with evf on left side...i hate that!
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner camera with 4K video
customer_reviews.text: This is a great beginner camera especially if you’re on a budget. It has a lot of wonderful features and it has awesome video quality. However it does have some glitches in it’s not very beginner user-friendly especially if you don’t know much about photography. I’m still trying to figure out all of the features and how to use it that’s why gave it four stars. Overall it’s a beautiful camera and It has a lot of features so I’m going to make some awesome first time YouTube videos and when I am more experienced and ready I will invest in a upgrade. Maybe the Canon 70D or 80D💕❤️ Good luck guys
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Baker

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this camera
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this camera the 4K is great the 1080 is great. I vlog with this camera and love how light it is. How versitale it is and the autofocus works very well. Also it come with a cinema profile that’s not the best but it gets by for films and videos. The photo burst mode is my favorite feature of the camera.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Williams

customer_reviews.title: I love this camera so far
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera so far. The picture quality is amazing in both bright and dark lighting. The movie operation works very well. I am only disappointed that the lens it comes with doesn't have much zoom. Also, I find that the shutter speed is delayed more than I would have expected. I'm really happy with it because it has a flip screen and a Mic port. It takes pictures better than my phone.
customer_reviews.author: A. Foley

customer_reviews.title: Best 4k camera for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing camera, takes vreat pictures even with the kit lence. If this is your first camera (like me) it will take a while to get used to shooting in manual mode. But if you put it in automatic mode its a breeze. Point and shoot. A lot of noise in dark shots.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Read the manual if you're new, great camera!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing camera. I'm pretty new to photography in general so I'm a little overwhelmed by the camera but even for total newbs it's pretty easy to grab a great looking shot that's miles better than anything a phone camera could capture. Make sure you read the manual and you'll be fine!
customer_reviews.author: Gen

customer_reviews.title: Amazing camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera is just what the doctor ordered. Panasonic really nailed it with this product, because it hits just about every sweet spot. It combines the ease of use with an amazing image/video outputt, and yet it's pleasantly light and ergonomic. I can't recommend this camera high enough.
customer_reviews.author: Saad Hamadi

customer_reviews.title: Impressive M4/3 camera!
customer_reviews.text: Speedy, high quality, well-made, lightweight, etc. This is a fantastic camera. This was purchased to be a complement to my existing Canon EOS Rebel T3i and its gear, but I find that I love it so much...I may end up having the G7 as my sole camera. I really like it!
customer_reviews.author: mLo68

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Was okay for couple of weeks and started freezing and shutting down.
customer_reviews.author: sudhir regmi

customer_reviews.title: Best 4k camera I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this light weight and compact camera body that products some of they highest 4k quality image I have seen in a camera this size. Having a camera this small but powerful makes taking video and capturing photos at the right moment so much easier. I have to give a big thanks to panasonic for helping me establish myself as a videographer and photographer. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Deshon Jones

customer_reviews.title: A great 4K Image for a low price
customer_reviews.text: I was needing a second inexpensive camera for shooting talking head videos. I added the 25mm lens and got a killer look from this camera. A great setup.
customer_reviews.author: JimmyHudson

customer_reviews.title: Superb Ergonomics, 4K Video
customer_reviews.text: This Pany G7 shines in terms of ergonomic design with ideal button and control placement; 4K video and photo quality, plus reasonable size. You can't go wrong with this digicam.
customer_reviews.author: ubercool

customer_reviews.title: Love this Camera
customer_reviews.text: I use this to shoot 4K videos for YouTube. Works great. I previously used Canon, but I've come to prefer the Panasonic interface.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb Smith

customer_reviews.title: Poor image quality
customer_reviews.text: I spent a long time learning this camera but found image quality to be less than other cameras of this category. I was disappointed and will be returning the camera.
customer_reviews.author: Erwin G

customer_reviews.title: Modern Photography.
customer_reviews.text: This an excellent Camera, I think prices have gone down. If you need/want and advance camera this is the one. Please read the instruction manual.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: is good
customer_reviews.text: This lumix has great 4k and is still good in 2018, even though it is about 2 years old.i strongly recommend this because of its great picture quality for its price.
customer_reviews.author: RRoumeli

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Was broken, never able to use. Tried to get it fixed but the camera parts are too old. Went to the trash 😒
customer_reviews.author: krissy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing camera!
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera. It takes great video, and the photo quality is amazing for the price. I’d buy it, because I did!
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Camera
customer_reviews.text: Amazing camera. This is my first micro 4/3 and also my first mirrorless camera, but it does great so far. The quality is amazing! The articulated screen makes it amazing for any video shooting even vlogging! If you are in the $500-700 range for a first camera, it is a great camera to start creating quality content
customer_reviews.author: Gabor Kukucska

customer_reviews.title: Fairly certain I received a used/open-box camera.
customer_reviews.text: I just got two of these and one was missing the hood, hot shoe cap, rear lens cap, the sensor cap, and the manuals. Maybe more, who knows. Edit: Even more certain this was used because I went ahead and turned it on. Settings were already in and the screen was smudgy.
customer_reviews.author: Clifford W. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Omg! I'm still getting use to this but the first picture and the fact that I can chat the scene awesome
customer_reviews.author: Iyabo afolabi

customer_reviews.title: BEST BUDGET CAMERA
customer_reviews.text: Sold it at a pawnshop cause i quit photography but its by far the best camera quality ive ever had id recommend sticking with it til battery life is ehh okay but yea go for it my dude
customer_reviews.author: Kwonterius

customer_reviews.title: A "4k-shooting-beast"
customer_reviews.text: It's a great starter camera for beginning narrative filmmakers who want to make films. And packs enough features for professional work as well. Especially considering that it comes with a kit-lens and shoots 4k for a lil over $500. Would recommend. 9.5/10
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love the camera and all its features. Bought it for 4K video and 4K burst stills, but might end up replacing my Canon 60D. The only negative is the pewter color. The dial icons are difficult to see (white on silver).
customer_reviews.author: Ted Ingraham

customer_reviews.title: I love that I can use the app to make it ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well. I love that I can use the app to make it start recording or take a picture if it's on a tripod. The app also allows you to use your phone as a viewfinder.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great camera, may have to get used to if you're not used to mirrorless, light, get a preview of your picture simce its digital, great pictures
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality at this price point
customer_reviews.text: Great lightweight camera and good quality at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley G. Bethel

customer_reviews.title: Top Quality for Livestreams
customer_reviews.text: I use it for live-streaming and it is so easy to use. The quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Harrell

customer_reviews.title: Good image quality
customer_reviews.text: Easy menu and good picture quality for hobby photography. Good size and weight. Overpriced lens and poor accessory support. Good price.
customer_reviews.author: Attila

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love how fast this camera is. This is my first mirror less and I love it. There’s so many nice features and buttons that I’m able to do a lot while filming in 4K. I can use my Nikon lenses which is bad.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Bui

customer_reviews.title: Love this camera
customer_reviews.text: So far this camera is doing everything I bought it for. I'm a little sad that new lenses are so expensive for this form factor, but the kit lens is pretty nice.
customer_reviews.author: WH3

customer_reviews.title: As a Begginer, I love it.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a pro, not even all that experienced with cameras. I am I loving this as an entry camera. It seems to have a good feature set and takes better photos then anything else I've owned. The accessories are somewhat expensive if your looking to stay within established brands, but it's also an expensive camera.
customer_reviews.author: G. B

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for the price, no real restrictions.
customer_reviews.text: As described, for the price point you expect to make some sacrifices on quality, I haven't noticed any to this point. The smartphone app is pretty awful, but that's not the camera's fault.
customer_reviews.author: Mikecdf

customer_reviews.title: This thing has everything and then some
customer_reviews.text: Pro camera for way under pro money. I got this mainly for HD video but the pictures and the cameras capabilities are everything you could ever want.
customer_reviews.author: Dorian

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Best camera ever. Superior video quality, lightweight, and very affordable. Can't go wrong with this budget 4K camera.
customer_reviews.author: OPTIUM3

customer_reviews.title: great quality and suer friendly
customer_reviews.text: great quality and suer friendly. bought for my husband, but i can easily navigate it as well. love the flip out screen
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Fiti

customer_reviews.title: Fun Camera!
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera, it's the best entry level camera there is! Just wish I would have seen one of the bundles with all the extras before I bought.
customer_reviews.author: David W Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase I've made all year
customer_reviews.text: A cheaper version of the GH4, this camera offers outstanding 4K quality in a small mirrorless package. Best purchase I've made all year!
customer_reviews.author: Big T

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: Just as described. Great camera. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: GisFu

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera! I use it for everyday photos, but I also use it for sports photography and traveling. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Schraufabagel

customer_reviews.title: Great camera.
customer_reviews.text: Really nice camera. Already have pics for sale online from this camera.
customer_reviews.author: RICHARD

customer_reviews.title: Great investment
customer_reviews.text: I'm a novice when it came to dslr cameras..this being my first one I didn't want to screw up... it's been a very fun experience. I'm into making short skits and pod cast and music videos this is a good camera for that the 4k is beautiful. Great investment.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Logan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, lightweight, fast tracking camera with an excellent owners manual, would happily buy another and recommend to a well seasoned pro or a beginner just getting started.
customer_reviews.author: R Schwalk

customer_reviews.title: I dont know where to start
customer_reviews.text: As amazing as cameras that are 3 times the price. This is the easiest and best camera ive ever used. Arrived in decent time, and packaged securely.
customer_reviews.author: S M

customer_reviews.title: Decent camera takes great photos the detail in the images are quite nice
customer_reviews.text: Works well. very light camera compared to my Canon 5D Photo quality is quite good. I would buy it again. I mainly bought this to play around with 4k video.
customer_reviews.author: cme4tv

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations!!
customer_reviews.text: Exceeded my expectations. From the articulating touch screen to the extra dials and custom buttons it's an amazing micro four thirds I plan on buying another at such an awesome price.
customer_reviews.author: Irv Vaz

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera!
customer_reviews.text: Really have enjoyed this camera so far. Super user friendly and easy to figure out and the quality is fantastic for the price! Definitely recommend for beginners!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Step into the world of Photography or Videography!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camera for any medium. Whether you're looking for a camera to take with you on vacation or a way to start in the world of videography, this is a perfect camera. It is sub $1000 and can shoot 4k video. It's lightweight so you can keep on you without getting weighed down. It doesn't attract attention with its small body. While it is only a micro 4/3 sensor, it can produce very sharp images or video.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Flores

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully made. Works like a dream and meets all ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully made. Works like a dream and meets all of my expectations. Wish it was a lit bit more sturdy(made of plastic), but the quality is unmatched for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Savage

customer_reviews.title: A Great Camera Packed With Features
customer_reviews.text: Incredible and reliable camera with a ton of features! The 4h filming mode is gorgeous. I love having the option to use my tablet as a remote monitor when filming. The Panasonic app links easily and reliably. Highly recommend for beginners looking to create polished hd videos and high res photos.
customer_reviews.author: Stuffologist

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for an professional camera while also not spending too much cash this is great! I have no problems with it and honestly Love it to bits! Everything just works properly and is so compact that you can film for a while without your jand getting tired
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: but it is intuitive and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Incredible camera for the price. I haven't spent a ton of time with it, but it is intuitive and easy to use. Video footage looks excellent, would not hesitate to buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron A.

product_meta.title: Panasonic Lumix G7KS 4K Mirrorless Camera, 16 Megapixel Digital Camera, 14-42 mm Lens Kit, DMC-G7KS
product_meta.description: Style:14-42mm| Color:Silver| Configuration:Camera OnlyDigital Single Lens Mirrorless camera 14 42MM Lens Kit, 4K. Image Sensor Type: Live MOS Sensor.
feature_bullets: Superb DSLM image quality without the bulk and weight of traditional DSLRs
Never miss a photo with three unique 4K ultra HD video pause and save 4K photo modes
Class leading, ultra compact, interchangeable lens and accessory option; HDMI: microHDMI TypeD / VIERA Link,video: Auto / 4K / 1080p / 1080i / 720p / 480p, Audio: stereo
Unwire your creativity with integrated Wi Fi sharing
Fast and precise auto focusing tracks the subject; Focus mode AFS (single) / AFF (flexible) / AFC (continuous) / MF, AF mode face/eye detection / tracking / 49 area / custom Multi / 1 area / pinpoint
